HazzesAdventure.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1       Sarova Panafric Hotel     Mid-range hotel in Nairobi (City, Kenya)     Breakfast & Dinner Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              Breakfast & Dinner Included       2-3       Ol Tukai Lodge     Luxury lodge inside Amboseli NP (Kenya)     All Meals Included                   +3 Photos                   All Meals Included       4       Treetops Lodge     Luxury lodge inside Aberdare NP (Kenya)     All Meals Included                            All Meals Included       5-6       Ashnil Samburu Camp     Luxury tented camp bordering Samburu NR (Kenya) without fences     All Meals Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              All Meals Included       7       Comfort Gardens Sweetwaters     Mid-range hotel just outside Ol Pejeta Conservancy (Laikipia Plateau, Kenya)     All Meals Included                   +5 Photos          +4 Photos              All Meals Included       8       Elsamere Lodge     Mid-range lodge at Lake Naivasha (Naivasha, Kenya)     All Meals Included                            All Meals Included       9-11       Ashnil Mara Camp     Luxury tented camp inside Masai Mara NR (Kenya)     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       12-13       Seronera Wildlife Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Central Serengeti NP (Tanzania)     All Meals Included                   +2 Photos                   All Meals Included       14       Marera Valley Lodge     Mid-range lodge 1-2hr drive from Ngorongoro Crater (Tanzania)     All Meals Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              All Meals Included       15      End of tour(No accommodation)      All Meals Included           All Meals Included
HazzesAdventure.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees
HazzesAdventure.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts in Nairobi, Kenya and ends in Arusha, Tanzania          This operator can help select your international flights, but you'll have to book them yourself help          Fly to Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          Fly back from Kilimanjaro Airport (JRO- Check price) near Arusha. Or fly from Arusha Airport  (ARK- Check price) via Dar es Salaam or Nairobi (Kenya)          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
